scripts.build:static: cp next.config.apk.mjs next.config.mjs && next build && cp next.config.vercel.mjs next.config.mjs
scripts.build:apk: npm run build:static && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
scripts.build:apk:prod: NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://your-backend.vercel.app npm run build:static && npx cap sync
